TopicTitle: Save File if Kerbal on a Ladder Will Cause an Error When Loaded (reference not set to an instance of an object)

Articles.Content:
KSP2 Version: 0.1.2.0.22258
Operating System: Windows 10
CPU+GPU+RAM: i9 9900K+3070ti+32GB
Mods Used: None

How to Replicate:

  1. Load KerbalOnLadderSaveFile
  2. Load KerbalOnLadderSaveFile again (To bypass another issue)

Save File:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/oyhl1y1ya1wjgz1/KerbalOnLadderSaveFile.zip?dl=0
Log Files:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/495gj21rmkk95m5/Ksp2.log%2BPlayer.log.zip?dl=0

Additional Information:
I haven't tested every part in the game but it appears to happen to both ladders and parts with built in ladders (pods, crew cabins)
